meanings.definition: The bones in the upper jaw of a vertebrate animal, forming the front part of the palate.
meanings.sent1: The premaxillaries help support the front of the palate.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the premaxillaries to check for any issues.
meanings.sent3: The premaxillaries decided to have a party on the palate.
meanings.sent4: The premaxillaries were the architects of the palate's structure.
meanings.sent5: The premaxillaries are like the foundation of a house, crucial for stability.

meanings.definition: The premaxillary teeth in the front of the upper jaw.
meanings.sent1: The premaxillaries are the first set of teeth in the upper jaw.
meanings.sent2: She brushed her premaxillaries carefully to keep them clean.
meanings.sent3: The premaxillaries were excited to chew their favorite food.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled, showcasing her premaxillaries.
meanings.sent5: The premaxillaries are like little soldiers guarding the front of the mouth.
